parameters.name: AutoProvisioningGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the auto provisioning group.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the auto provisioning group. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
